ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure/Enterprise-Scale
ns0:entry.ns0:content: The Azure Landing Zones (Enterprise-Scale) architecture provides prescriptive guidance coupled with Azure best practices, and it follows design principles across the critical design areas for organizations to define their Azure architecture

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Azure/Security-Copilot
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Microsoft Security Copilot is a generative AI-powered security solution that helps increase the efficiency and capabilities of defenders to improve security outcomes at machine speed and scale, while remaining compliant to responsible AI principles

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Micke-K/IntuneManagement
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Copy, export, import, delete, document and compare policies and profiles in Intune and Azure with PowerShell script and WPF UI. Import ADMX files and registry settings with ADMX ingestion. View and edit PowerShell script.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/SkipToTheEndpoint/OpenIntuneBaseline

Used to track issues regarding the latest version of the AL compiler and developer tools available in the Visual Studio Code Marketplace or as part of the AL Developer Preview builds for Dynamics 365 Business Central.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/microsoftarchive/New-KrbtgtKeys.ps1
ns0:entry.ns0:content: This script will enable you to reset the krbtgt account password and related keys while minimizing the likelihood of Kerberos authentication issues being caused by the operation.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/ugurkocde/DeviceOffboardingManager
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A PowerShell GUI tool for efficiently managing and offboarding devices from Microsoft Intune, Autopilot, and Entra ID, featuring bulk operations and real-time analytics for streamlined device lifecycle management.
